title: Activated sludge prokaryote and eukaryote characterization in a pulp mill facility using amplicon sequencing

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 14

Author(s): Ignacio López Bravo, María Fernanda Dominguez, Ana Claudia Mionetto, Daniela Franca, Hugo Naya, Lucia Spangenberg, Tamara Fernández-Calero
